root: ^Welcome home, son. You are early today.

YESMAMA: ^Yes, mama. They said they are having an emergency.
^I'm pretty sure it's about Teddy being gone.
POLICE: ^There were police officers at the school.
^I hope they can find him now, Barbara must be so depressed.
ERRAND: ^Aris, can you buy Salt and Vinegar at Otits? No one can watch over Junior here.
